words.definition: At a short distance from something.
words.arabic_definition: على مسافة قصيرة من شيء ما.

example.en: The school is near the library.
My house is far from here.
The post office is next to the bank.

words.definition: At the front side of something.
words.arabic_definition: في الجهة الأمامية من شيء ما.

example.en: The bus stop is in front of the school.

words.arabic_definition: في الجزء الخلفي من شيء ما.

example.en: The car is parked behind the building.
